member.name: R:Project
member.summary: This project uses the inbuilt features of the System.Diagnostics namespace, and shows how logging and tracing can be integrated into a client application whilst taking advantage of the services exposed by System.Diagnostics.

member.name: N:Essential
member.summary: General utility classes to support various logging features.

member.name: N:Essential.Data
member.summary: Database utility classes to support logging trace information to databases.

member.name: N:Essential.Diagnostics
member.summary: Extensions to the .NET Framework System.Diagnostics including trace listeners, filters and utility classes.
